body.p: Paragraphs BC4.193–BC4.194 discuss circumstances in which a financial asset is originated or purchased at a discount to the par amount. However, the IASB noted that its rationale for the exception described in paragraph BC4.192 is equally relevant for assets that are originated or purchased at a premium and therefore decided that the exception should apply symmetrically to both circumstances.
